price: 还有同属他们却没有赶上他们的其他人。他〔安拉〕是万能的，是至睿的。
arabic: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَمَّا يَلۡحَقُواْ بِهِمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: waākharīna min'hum lammā yalḥaqū bihim wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
